44.ara-name: كتاب الأمثال عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Do you think that if there was a river by the gate of one of you, and he bathed in it five times each day that there would remain any filth on him?" They said: "No filth would stay on him." He said: "That is the parable of the five prayers, Allah wipes out the sins with them

chapter.eng-name: The Parable Of The Five Prayers

hadiths.text: Another chain reports a similar narration

chapter.eng-name: The Parable Of The Five Prayers
